name: Michael Scott
text: Worst place ever to get food! Manager acted out of character and has no clue what being a manager means!!!!!! My whole order was wrong and tried to call back up there to see if they could fix my order that was totally wrong!!!! Manager …More

name: Kimberly Corsello
text: The food looks nothing like the pictures. And it doesn't taste that great either. This is a picture of their Garden Supreme pizza!

name: Anna Penton
text: Rude on the phone, Wouldn't bring pizza out to curb even after I confirmed that they did curb side delivery when I called in. I should have listened to others who told me how the Pizza Hut in Bay Springs MS. Is Rude and slow. Apparently …More

name: Jackie Core
text: Pineapple on our pizza was sour

name: Shawn Eubanks
text: A restaurant should never get this bad. There is what looks like 3 employees attending to the whole store. None of the tables are clean and I've seen patrons have to move dishes just to sit down and eat. An employee even came to check on who was here, take the tips off the tables, and not bus them.

name: Rachel Zugg
text: Sometimes something gets lost in translation and the order gets messed up.... But when they do things right you can't find better pizza

name: Christine Bean
text: While paying for my order I watched the man preparing the pizzas. While scratching his face and arm he kept using his hands to put cheese and pepperoni on the pizza with no gloves on. Also had a long beard and hair with no nets covering. The quality of the food and service has very much went down since there previous manager left.

name: Alice B.
text: Love this place! Staff was amazing! Polite, fast and friendly employees! Keep up the good work you guys and gals...A little pricey but still overall 5/5 stars from me!

name: Michael Eubanks
text: Sorry pizza, EVERY table had food on it. Manager building pizzas without gloves.

name: Savannah Leach
text: I went there to eat lunch and every table was was dirty and still plates on them. We had to move the plates to sit and eat and other customers cleaned off the rest of the tables so people could sit down to eat. Very nasty but the workers were nice.

name: Mellissa Hendry
text: I love my hometown Pizza Hut. Whether I order online, call or just go in, it is always wonderful and delicious.

name: Barbara Stephens
text: Excellent staff. Very professional neatly dressed, well spoken,  and friendly.

name: Ina Ainsworth
text: Very friendly staff!! I don't meet a stranger and they were all super nice. I will definitely be back.

name: Khala Gavin
text: It good.  And they where friendly this time

name: ToMas McGee
text: Wonderful place to work and eat

name: Tiffany Ratcliff
text: Clean and the staff really friendly also love the pizza, pasta and etc.

name: Donna Newell
text: Worst service ever. My order was supposed to be ready at 4:50 stayed there until 5:40 only because I had paid with my credit card because they told me my order was in the oven. I got tired of waiting they gave me a free cookie and store credit said it would take a few days for my money to be credited back to my card.

name: MattieJ Vs the World
text: Normally a good place. Don't order online with the big deals like 50% off all pizza they will lose your ticket and can't give you a refund. Been sitting here a hour no pizza... …More

text: Great food and great atmosphere

name: Jessica Ross
text: I'm not sure why they cant keep employees but to dine in takes hours due to being understaffed your better off ordering from this pizza hut online.

name: Apollyon Kurze
text: [3-1-19] Pizza was as good as always, but it took an abnormally long time to get it.
